CustomField.description:
You may update a field on the master record. The update occurs when the user Logs Activity, either from PointMerge or Mass Merge.
Enter the API field name, an equals sign, and the value to set (with spaces replaced with plus signs).
For example: Status__c=Completed
A special case: Status_Date__c=Today
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Enter the API field name, an equals sign, and the value to set (with spaces replaced with plus signs).
Examples: Status__c=Completed Status_Date__c=Today Stage__c=In Progress
CustomField.label: Master Field to Set 1
